page.title: 10A Moslem Sunday in Bristol
page.content: My mum usually wakes up in the morning about half past four or five to pray. Then she goes back to sleep again. We have to pray five times a day. Then I wake up in the morning about 10 or 11 a.m. and when everyone else wakes up my mum makes us some breakfast. Then my mum prays again at 2 p.m. and me and my brother go to the park and come back at 4 p.m. Then at about 5 p.m. we pray again and we play with our friend Mark. We stop playing at about 7.30 p.m. and go to pray in the Mosque and until the next time to pray we read the Koran or we sometimes play in the hall. At 10 p.m. it is the last time to pray. When we finish reading, we go home about 12 o'clock and we go to sleep.
